filmography.title: The Killers
filmography.role_description: A sultry, duplicitous femme fatale who ensnares a profound ex-boxer (Burt Lancaster) in a robbery scheme, leading to his doom.
filmography.plot: Hit men kill an unresisting victim, and an insurance investigator unravels the man's past betrayal by a beautiful woman.

filmography.title: The Hucksters
filmography.role_description: A worldly nightclub singer who shares a past with a cynical advertising executive played by Clark Gable.
filmography.plot: A radio advertising executive struggles with his integrity while working for a tyrannical soap tycoon and romance blooms.

filmography.title: One Touch of Venus
filmography.role_description: The statue of the Goddess of Love come to life, who creates romantic chaos for a department store window dresser.
filmography.plot: A window dresser kisses a statue of Venus, bringing her to life and complicating his engagement and career.

filmography.title: The Bribe
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer and wife of a suspect who becomes the romantic interest of a federal agent tracking war surplus smugglers.
filmography.plot: A federal agent investigates a racket in Central America but falls in love with the wife of one of the suspects.

filmography.title: The Great Sinner
filmography.role_description: A Russian general's daughter whose own gambling addiction entraps a writer, based on Dostoevsky's 'The Gambler'.
filmography.plot: A writer tries to save a woman from her gambling addiction but becomes hooked himself.

filmography.title: East Side, West Side
filmography.role_description: A former mistress who returns to complicate the life of a wealthy New York couple, leading to murder.
filmography.plot: A New York socialite questions her marriage when her husband's old flame returns and is later found murdered.

filmography.title: Pandora and the Flying Dutchman
filmography.role_description: A cruel, captivating American singer in Spain who becomes the obsession of a cursed sea captain.
filmography.plot: A beautiful woman destroys the lives of men who love her until she meets a mysterious captain doomed to sail the seas forever.

filmography.title: Show Boat
filmography.role_description: A riverboat star whose career and life are ruined when her mixed-race heritage is exposed.
filmography.plot: The lives and loves of performers and workers on a Mississippi River show boat over 40 years.

filmography.title: The Snows of Kilimanjaro
filmography.role_description: The lost love of a dying writer, whose memory haunts him as he reflects on his life while stranded in Africa.
filmography.plot: Writer Harry Street reflects on his life as he lies dying from an infection while on safari in the shadow of Mount Kilimanjaro.

filmography.title: Lone Star
filmography.role_description: A fiercely independent newspaper editor in 1845 Texas who becomes involved in the political intrigue of annexation.
filmography.plot: A cattle baron tasked with bringing Texas into the Union clashes with a senator and falls for a newspaper woman.

filmography.title: Mogambo
filmography.role_description: A wisecracking, good-hearted showgirl stranded at an African safari station who vies for the affection of a big-game hunter.
filmography.plot: On a Kenyan safari, a white hunter finds himself torn between a sultry showgirl and a prim, married anthropologist.

filmography.title: Knights of the Round Table
filmography.role_description: The legendary Queen whose forbidden love for Sir Lancelot threatens the unity of Camelot.
filmography.plot: King Arthur's rule is threatened by the adulterous love between Sir Lancelot and Queen Guinevere.

filmography.title: Ride, Vaquero!
filmography.role_description: A pioneer wife whose arrival on a ranch incites a conflict between her husband and his bandit brother.
filmography.plot: Ranchers in post-Civil War Texas try to fend off a bandit leader who is the estranged brother of the ranch owner.

filmography.title: The Barefoot Contessa
filmography.role_description: A Spanish nightclub dancer who becomes a Hollywood star but finds that fame and wealth cannot bring her happiness.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized story of the life and career of a Spanish sex symbol, told in flashbacks at her funeral.

filmography.title: Bhowani Junction
filmography.role_description: An Anglo-Indian woman in 1947 India who struggles with her identity and is torn between three men of different backgrounds.
filmography.plot: During the British withdrawal from India, an Anglo-Indian woman faces an identity crisis and a turbulent love life.

filmography.title: The Little Hut
filmography.role_description: A neglected wife shipwrecked on a desert island with her husband and her lover, leading to a comedic triangle.
filmography.plot: A husband, wife, and the wife's lover are shipwrecked on a desert island, forcing them to deal with their awkward situation.

filmography.title: The Sun Also Rises
filmography.role_description: A promiscuous and disillusioned English aristocrat who drifts through post-WWI Europe with a group of expatriates.
filmography.plot: A group of disillusioned American expatriate writers live a dissolute, hedonistic lifestyle in France and Spain in the 1920s.

filmography.title: The Naked Maja
filmography.role_description: The aristocratic muse and lover of painter Francisco Goya, whose relationship defies the Spanish Inquisition.
filmography.plot: The story of the romance between the painter Francisco Goya and the Duchess of Alba in 18th-century Spain.

filmography.title: On the Beach
filmography.role_description: A party-loving woman in Australia who finds a final, poignant romance with a submarine commander as nuclear fallout approaches.
filmography.plot: After a global nuclear war, the residents of Australia must come to terms with the fact that all life will be destroyed in a matter of months.

filmography.title: The Angel Wore Red
filmography.role_description: A cabaret entertainer who falls in love with a priest who has renounced his vows during the Spanish Civil War.
filmography.plot: A priest leaves the church during the Spanish Civil War and falls in love with a cabaret girl while hiding a holy relic.

filmography.title: 55 Days at Peking
filmography.role_description: A Russian baroness caught in the Siege of the International Legations during the Boxer Rebellion in China.
filmography.plot: Diplomats, soldiers, and other representatives of a dozen nations fend off the siege of the International Compound in Peking during the 1900 Boxer Rebellion.

filmography.title: Seven Days in May
filmography.role_description: A Washington mistress who unwittingly holds the key to exposing a military coup against the President.
filmography.plot: United States military leaders plot to overthrow the President because he supports a nuclear disarmament treaty and they fear a Soviet sneak attack.

filmography.title: The Night of the Iguana
filmography.role_description: The earthy, free-spirited owner of a run-down Mexican hotel who battles for the soul of a defrocked priest.
filmography.plot: A defrocked Episcopal priest leads a busload of middle-aged Baptist women on a tour of the Mexican coast and comes to terms with his demons.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe & BAFTA: Nomination – Best Actress; San Sebastián Film Festival: Win – Best Actress

filmography.title: The Bible: In the Beginning...
filmography.role_description: The wife of Abraham, portraying the biblical matriarch in John Huston's epic retelling of the Book of Genesis.
filmography.plot: Extensive and massive depiction of the first part of the Book of Genesis, covering the creation of the world to the binding of Isaac.

filmography.title: Mayerling
filmography.role_description: The Empress of Austria and mother of Crown Prince Rudolf, witnessing the tragic decline of her son.
filmography.plot: The tragic love story of Austrian Crown Prince Rudolf and his mistress Baroness Mary Vetsera.

filmography.title: The Life and Times of Judge Roy Bean
filmography.role_description: The famous actress and object of Judge Roy Bean's obsession, appearing in a pivotal cameo at the film's end.
filmography.plot: An outlaw establishes his own brand of law and order in a town on the edge of the Texas frontier.

filmography.title: Earthquake
filmography.role_description: The nagging, unhappy daughter of a studio boss who is trapped in a high-rise during a massive Los Angeles earthquake.
filmography.plot: Various people struggle to survive when a major earthquake hits Los Angeles.

filmography.title: The Cassandra Crossing
filmography.role_description: A wealthy arms dealer's wife traveling on a plague-infested train, caught in a disaster.
filmography.plot: Passengers on a European train have been exposed to a deadly disease, and authorities attempt to quarantine them by rerouting the train over an unstable bridge.

filmography.title: The Sentinel
filmography.role_description: A mysterious real estate agent who rents an apartment in a brownstone that turns out to be a gateway to hell.
filmography.plot: A young model moves into a historic Brooklyn brownstone, only to find that the building has a terrifying secret.

filmography.title: City on Fire
filmography.role_description: An alcoholic news reporter who finds her purpose covering a massive city-wide fire disaster.
filmography.plot: A corrupt mayor builds a refinery in the center of a city, which explodes and causes a massive firestorm.

filmography.title: The Kidnapping of the President
filmography.role_description: The wife of the Vice President who becomes involved in a crisis when the US President is kidnapped.
filmography.plot: Terrorists kidnap the US President while he is on a visit to Toronto and hold him for ransom in an armored truck rigged with explosives.

filmography.title: Priest of Love
filmography.role_description: A wealthy American art patron who supports D.H. Lawrence in New Mexico.
filmography.plot: The biography of writer D.H. Lawrence, focusing on his relationships and his battle with tuberculosis.

filmography.title: Regina Roma
filmography.role_description: A controlling mother who tries to manipulate her son's life; Gardner's final feature film role.
filmography.plot: An aging couple tries to maintain family harmony when their son returns home with his fiancée.
